name: Store Interface 5
description: This Store Interface is great if you want to use images to showcase your Clover Inventory.

settings.label: Page width
settings.info:
Default page width recommendation is 1024px.
You can make changes here

settings.label: Show Quantity Pop Up window after adding any item to cart
settings.info: This will show the Quantity selection window when selecting 'add to cart' button. The customer can still change the quantity later in the checkout process

settings.label: Show Quantity Pop Up window for items with modifiers
settings.info: This will show the Quantity selection window for items with modifiers when selecting 'Choose Qty & Options' The customer can still change the Quantity later in the checkout processs. Note : this doesn't affect modifier Qty selection
